name: Payroll Software
short_description: Flexible Structure building capability of Earnings & Deductions Flexibility to add or modify any number of Salary Components User Defined Entry Field with unmatched flexibility for Formula, percentage or Customized Calculation Taxable & Non Taxable Earnings Payslip/ Non Payslip Component Calculation based on Attendance Monthly or Yearly Payments Also compute various other components that do not appear in payslips Leave & Attendance Management Leave Rules can be defined Increment of Leave on Pro-rata basis Carry forward facility for balance leave Encashment of Leave Leave utilized & balances can be checked CL, PL, SL, Compensatory & Customizable Leaves Automatic Leave payout on termination of Employees Swipe card / Attendance machine if any can be linked to our sofware
summary: A stress free payroll system. A payroll genie. A magic wand to carryou
